item.description:
Let's have dinner before we see/listen to Don't Call Me Shirley. 

Note: The band goes on at 9:00 (not 8:00 that I have scheduled but I will leave that as it is).  Getting there early for dinner gets us a great seat to see a great band!

I WILL be making a reservation so only serious RSVP's. 

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you!

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

Looking forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the waiting area.
item.name: Dinner at Vic's Boat house
